WhyChoose.title: Why Construction Companies Choose Us
WhyChoose.description: We combine industry expertise with dedicated support to help your business thrive.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We commit to deadlines, organized workflows, and consistent communication. Our 99% on-time delivery rate speaks for itself.
reliability.fulldesc: At The Builders Desk, reliability is at the core of everything we do. We understand that in construction, timing is critical. Our team is committed to meeting deadlines, maintaining organized workflows, and ensuring consistent communication with your team. Our 98% on-time delivery rate demonstrates our dedication to being a partner you can count on, project after project.

scalability.title: Scalability and Flexibility
scalability.description: Our solutions fit with your business. Add services, scale up with your business, and adjust as needed.
scalability.fulldesc: No long-term contracts. Stop when you need to, and pick back up when you are ready. From sole proprietors and small builders to large firms, our services scale with your business. Whether you need 10 hours a week or full-time support across multiple services, we adapt to your changing needs without the overhead of hiring full-time staff.

industry.title: Industry-Specific Expertise
industry.description: We understand construction's unique challenges, budget issues, and regulatory requirements. We know the industry.
industry.fulldesc: Our project managers are PMP trained and have a minimum of Bachelor's degrees in their respective fields. We don't just understand business—we understand construction specifically: every permit requirement, estimate detail, budget nuance, and regulatory compliance issue. We speak your language and bring real industry expertise to every task.

technology.title: Technology and Software
technology.description: We invest in the latest tools to give you the best experience and competitive advantage.
technology.fulldesc: We invest in the latest and greatest tools to get the task done. We own and have proficiency in software like: Planswift, Primavera P6, AutoCAD, Revit, Lumion, 3D Max, Sketch Up, and more. This ensures we can seamlessly integrate with your existing workflows and deliver professional results.

training.title: Continued Training
training.description: Our team stays ahead through specialized training and continuous learning.
training.fulldesc: We stay ahead of the times by enrolling our team members in specialized training programs like PMP, Microsoft Office Suite, Customer Service Representative certification, and more. Continuous professional development ensures our team brings the latest best practices to your business.

hiring.title: Hiring Selection
hiring.description: We hire the top 1% with optimal education, experience, and certifications.
hiring.fulldesc: We hire the top 1% with a basic requirement of undergraduate degrees in the areas of specialization like: construction management, architecture, engineering, etc. Our Admins hold undergraduate degrees in fields like business administration, communication, English, and more. Quality starts with quality people.

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.description: A simple, proven process to get you the support you need
HowItWorks.steps-1-text: We learn about your company, challenges, and specific needs through an in-depth consultation.
HowItWorks.steps-2-text: We tailor a support package with the right services and frequency for your business.
HowItWorks.steps-3-text: In one week, we will select and onboard the right team member to commence working on your projects.
HowItWorks.steps-4-text: As you expand, we scale with you—adding services or hours as needed.

header.title: Your Trusted Back-Office Partner for Construction Success
header.description: We provide comprehensive support services that help construction companies streamline operations and scale efficiently.

whyChooseUs.title: Your Trusted Back-Office Partner
whyChooseUs.description: We handle the administrative details so you can focus on building great projects and growing your business.

features.title: Save Time & Money
features.description: Reduce overhead costs and free up time for what matters most—building.

features.title: Scale Efficiently
features.description: Grow your business without the growing pains of hiring in-house staff.

features.title: Industry Experts
features.description: Work with professionals who understand construction inside and out.

features.title: 24/7 Support
features.description: Get help when you need it with our dedicated support team.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower construction companies to focus on what they do best—building—by providing comprehensive, reliable back-office support that streamlines operations, improves efficiency, and drives business growth.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the most trusted partner for construction companies nationwide, recognized for our industry expertise, commitment to excellence, and ability to help businesses scale efficiently.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: These principles guide everything we do and shape how we serve our clients.

items.title: Reliability
items.desc: Consistent, dependable service you can count on day after day.

items.desc: Industry-leading standards in every task we handle for you.

members.title: Estimators

expertiseBanner.title: Industry-Specific Expertise
expertiseBanner.description: Every member of our team has construction industry experience or specialized training in construction business operations. We speak your language and understand your unique challenges.

cta.heading: Ready to Build Better Business?
cta.description: Experience the difference that reliable, construction-focused back-office support can make for your business.

ourStory.title: Built on Experience
paragraphs: The Builders Desk was founded by construction industry veterans who understood firsthand the challenges of managing back-office operations while trying to grow a construction business.
We saw too many talented contractors struggling with administrative tasks, project documentation, and financial management—taking time away from what they do best: building exceptional projects.
Today, we've assembled a team of construction-focused professionals who provide specialized support services, allowing construction companies to operate more efficiently and scale confidently.
ourStory.conclusion: Our commitment to reliability, scalability, and industry expertise has made us a trusted partner for construction companies across the nation.

qualifications.sectionTitle: Some key qualifications of your back office team
qualifications.sectionDescription: Expert capabilities across all service areas

list.title: Project Management Support
list.sub: Expert project managers with industry credentials.
items: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management or Engineering
PMP (Project Management Professional) certification
Expert proficiency in project management software (Procore, Buildertrend, CoConstruct)
Expert proficiency in MS Office suite and Google Suite
Expert proficiency in scheduling software (Primavera P6, MS Project)
OSHA safety certification
Minimum 5+ years construction industry experience

list.title: Administrative Support
items: Bachelor's degree in relevant field
Customer Service Rep training course
Expert proficiency in CRM Management (ClickUp, HubSpot, Salesforce, Trello, Asana, Monday, etc.)
Expert proficiency in MS Office suite and Google Suite
Advanced communication and organizational skills
Experience in construction industry preferred
Document management expertise

list.title: Business Development
items: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
Expert proficiency in estimating software (Planswift, Bluebeam, On-Screen Takeoff)
Advanced knowledge of construction bidding processes
Proposal writing and RFP response expertise
Expert proficiency in MS Office suite and Google Suite
Experience with pre-qualification and bonding requirements
Strong analytical and presentation skills

list.title: Bookkeeping
items: Degree in Accounting or Finance
Expert proficiency in QuickBooks and/or Xero
Construction accounting specialization
Payroll processing certification
Knowledge of job costing and WIP reporting
Expert proficiency in MS Office suite and Google Suite
Understanding of construction-specific tax requirements

list.title: Marketing
items: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or Design
Expert proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)
Social media management certification
SEO and digital marketing expertise
Website development and management skills
Content creation and copywriting experience
Construction industry marketing experience preferred

list.title: Human Resources
list.sub: HR professionals ensuring compliance and efficiency.
items: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources or Business Administration
HR certification (PHR, SPHR, or SHRM-CP)
Expert proficiency in HRIS systems
Knowledge of labor laws and construction industry regulations
Recruitment and talent acquisition expertise
Expert proficiency in MS Office suite and Google Suite
Employee relations and conflict resolution skills

list.title: Architecture & Design
items: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Architecture or related field
Proficiency in AutoCAD, REVIT, SketchUp
Expert proficiency in rendering software (V-ray, Lumion, 3ds Max)
Shop drawing and as-built documentation expertise
3D modeling and visualization skills
Understanding of building codes and regulations
Minimum 5+ years of design and drafting experience

items.title: Scalable
items.description: Easily adjust your plan as your business needs change

items.question: Can I customize my plan?
items.answer: Absolutely! We understand every construction business is unique. Contact us to create a custom plan that fits your specific needs.

items.question: What if I need more hours?
items.answer: Additional hours can be purchased at competitive rates. We also offer flexible upgrades to higher-tier plans as your needs grow.

items.question: Is there a contract commitment?
items.answer: We offer both month-to-month and annual plans. Annual plans include a 10% discount.

items.question: How quickly can we get started?
items.answer: Most clients are up and running within 5–7 business days after the initial consultation and plan selection.
